question: Where will I find Buddyshield Call recordings on the panel?
steps: From the Dashboard, click on the 'Buddyshield' tab.
Within this section, locate the tabs labeled 'RTO Instructed' and 'RTO Requested'.
Click on these tabs to view the associated Buddyshield call recordings.
outcome: You will be able to access and listen to the call recordings for the selected categories.
note: Ensure you have proper permissions to access call recording data.
